title: Episode 7: Drive-in Movies and Our Fading Love Affair with Cars!
description: Phil and Skye talk about drive-in movies and young America’s fading love affair with cars. Phil is perplexed with PETA and they have a rich conversation around science and faith. This one is not to be missed!
